related_post.text: i use selenium to go to the site click on upload button and then a explorer window open up for me to select file to upload how do it deal with he explorer window

so_post.text: > i use selenium to go to the site click on upload button and then a explorer window open up for me to select file to upload how do it deal with he explorer windowthis thread says https://stackoverflow.com/questions/8665072/howtouploadfilepicturewithseleniumpythonto do this: `send_keys(os.getcwd()+yourfilename)`
